text: HubSpot not saving
Is HubSpot playing up?
Is HubSpot down ?

Nothing on their status page but definitely playing up for us too
<https://status.HubSpot.com/>

Hey everyone, hope you are all doing well.
Im wondering if its possible to change the "unsubscribe" message for the email footer template based on language.

I have choice field which is multiple selecting , but I need the value one by one like following are my choices


*and I need to get values like this ("h1, h2, h3, h4")*
@chanel any one can help me on this
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/How-get-multiple-choice-values/m-p/742440#M32340>

Hello,
is there a way to add a section on an empty dnd_area in editor? Currently it seems that it is only possible using the ‘+’ (‘insert-new-section-button’), wich does not appear when the dnd_area is empty. So in order to add a section you have to add a module to that area (and remove it after adding a section).
Or is this sth. wich can be enabled by configuration (didn’t come across sth. on that one yet)?
You don't need to send the same message in every channel.
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YH119N2/p1673953773954839>

yeah man, it's really annoying. Also if you really think you need to cross post the message just copy the link to your first message. This helps make sure your question doesn't get answered twice by 2 different people

Hi everyone, I’m using HubSpot chat on our application. is there a way to listen to close chat widget box. I tried to look on docs for `conversationMinimized`or some other event that resemble that, but couldn’t find. I also tried to get the button from my app but blocked by cross origin. is there a way to do it ? thanks
Hi, I embbeded a HubSpot form in WordPress + Elementor and *most of of time* it won't load. Anyone here can help to troubleshoot?

Hi. Question about redirects and indexing. For some reason, HubSpot won’t allow me to create redirects for 404 files and so I’m unable to fix those 404 errors. Should I just `no index nofollow` the broken 404s and fix them in the file manager to avoid new 404s in the next crawl?

Hi all. I’m trying to embed a HubSpot form in an Elementor page and it shows up fine in the preview and even when I view just the published section, but not on the full published page. Any idea what’s going on here?
Can anyone help with importing some CSS code into a HubSpot site I am creating?
<@U01QVR44MEY> do you have experience setting up a sync between external systems and HubSpot? I have a few clients needing this and looking for any advice or suggestions.
Yeah currently it's looks like building your own frontend and storing the backend data on your own server
Not yet, but not on the calendar until Q2, so have a few more weeks to figure it out.

hi everyone! im pretty new to HubSpot and im not actually a developer, but im looking for some help - can anyone walk me through how i would go about adding a blog author's name to their blog post, so it shows up at the top with their photo and the date? after chatting with hs support it sounds like the way to do this is by adding code to my template?
<@U037QED9TR6> thanks for the invite
